tool.name: SAGA.ta_hydrology.10
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False isArrayWEIGHTS False output_data_BALANCE $output_data_BALANCE name SAGA.ta_hydrology.10 DEM $DEM WEIGHTS $WEIGHTS WEIGHTS_DEFAULT $WEIGHTS_DEFAULT METHOD $METHOD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_BALANCE $OutputSection_BALANCE.outputType_BALANCE transmissionMode_BALANCE $OutputSection_BALANCE.transmissionMode_BALANCE

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: WEIGHTS
param.label: Weights
param.help: Weights The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: WEIGHTS_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no grid has been selected

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_BALANCE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_BALANCE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
